name: Dell iDRAC Orchestrator
description: Certificate inventory and management for Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller appliances

store_types.Name: iDRAC

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: The user ID (or, if using a PAM provider, the key pointing to the user ID) to log into the iDRAC instance being managed.

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: The password (or, if using a PAM provider, the key pointing to the password) for the user ID above.

store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The IP address of the iDRAC instance being managed.
store_types.StorePathDescription: Enter the full path where the Racadm executable is installed on the orchestrator server.  See [Requirements & Prerequisites](#requirements-&-prerequisites) above for more details.
